synopsis: In episode #8 of the podcast, Devam and Ahir welcome guest Ganesh Ramakrishnan, who shares his journey through motivation, anxiety, and the importance of pursuing one's passions. The conversation dives deep into the struggles of balancing personal interests with societal expectations, while also providing valuable insights on self-care and emotional regulation.
quotes: Sometimes you just need to wiggle your toe to get started.
Procrastination is not a sign of laziness; it's often an emotional regulation issue.
You are not your thoughts; you are the one experiencing them.
It's okay to be kind to yourself and give yourself grace.
When you're anxious, you feel unsafe. Make sure to create a safe space for yourself.
If you can't get out of bed, start with baby steps—just sit up.
You can't wait for your mind to get right; you need to show your mind what's possible.
Make yourself uncomfortable and try new things; that's how you find your path.
Talk to people about what you enjoy; it can lead you to discover new passions.
Even small wins matter—celebrate them, no matter how insignificant they may seem.
